Text.Page:
Hi! Do you have a minute? My friend is very sick. Super sick. So ill. I can brew up a cure quickly, but I need kamara blood to do it. I'm not a soldier, so I ask you.

Bring the blood from {@LinkCreature:29#3011#thorntail kamaras} and {@LinkCreature:29#3012#elder thorntails} and I can save him.

Go slay now.

Gosh. That's a lot of blood. Hope none of it's yours. Bad for cure.

I'll get brewing and fix my friend up. Thanks!
They're just kamaras. It's not like they can hurt you. Me, they can kill, but you're a soldier. Kill quickly.
